name: Kale Smoothie - That Actually Tastes Good!
description: A Kale Smoothie recipe that actually tastes amazing! The perfect breakfast or snack, with no bananas and full of protein.
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons hemp, chia or flax seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a high powered blender and blend until creamy and smooth. Start with 1 cup of water, and if it's too thick add the extra 1/2 cup. I tend to enjoy a thinner smoothie so I use the full 1 1/2 cups of water.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients to a high powered blender and blend until creamy and smooth. Start with 1 cup of water, and if it's too thick add the extra 1/2 cup. I tend to enjoy a thinner smoothie so I use the full 1 1/2 cups of water.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately. It makes either one large serving, or two smaller servings.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve immediately. It makes either one large serving, or two smaller servings.

keywords: green smoothie, kale smoothie, vegan smoothie
